heroHeadline: Most Malaysians miss RM3,000+ in reliefs. Find yours in 5 minutes.

tagline: Your personal Malaysian tax relief calculator
subtitle: Answer questions about your income and expenses. We'll calculate your tax, show reliefs you qualify for, find savings opportunities, and generate your Form BE guide.
formSubtitle: Below is a guide showing where to fill each field on your LHDN form (YA 2025). Highlighted fields are where your specific data goes.
disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer: This is an educational tool and estimate only ‚Äî not tax advice. Always verify with LHDN's official guidelines at hasil.gov.my or consult a licensed tax agent. Relief limits are based on YA 2025.

pcbNote: Monthly Tax Deduction (PCB): Check that the pre-filled PCB amount matches your EA form. If you've overpaid through PCB, you'll receive a refund from LHDN within 30 working days of e-filing.
sectionANote: Fill in your name, IC number, TIN, address, marital status, and employer number from your EA form.
